movie.title: Red Sunset Drive
movie.description_intro: When a serial killer is targeting prostitutes and draining their blood, a detective and his unusual new partner must try to solve the case before another young woman is killed.
movie.description_full: When a serial killer is targeting prostitutes and draining their blood, a detective and his unusual new partner must try to solve the case before another young woman is killed.

movies.title: Abbott and Costello Meet Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
movies.title_english: Abbott and Costello Meet Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
movies.title_long: Abbott and Costello Meet Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde (1953)
movies.summary: Slim and Tubby are American cops in London to study police tactics. They wind up in jail and are bailed out by Dr. Jekyll. Jekyll has been murdering fellow doctors who laugh at his experiments. He has more murders in mind. At one point the serum that turns Jekyll into the murderous Hyde gets injected into Tubby.
movies.description_full: Slim and Tubby are American cops in London to study police tactics. They wind up in jail and are bailed out by Dr. Jekyll. Jekyll has been murdering fellow doctors who laugh at his experiments. He has more murders in mind. At one point the serum that turns Jekyll into the murderous Hyde gets injected into Tubby.

movies.title: The Shadow Within
movies.summary: A supernatural thriller about Maurice Dumont, a nine year-old who can connect with the dead. Propelled by grief over the death of Maurice's twin brother Jacques at birth, his mother Marie falls under the influence of Madame Armand, who convinces Marie to force her son to act as a medium to the next world. As Jacques asserts himself through Maurice, he comes to the realization that they both desire the same thing: their parents' love, only Jacques does not want to return to the living: he wants his parents to join him in the afterlife.

movies.title: Gamera the Brave
movies.summary: In 1973, Gamera sacrifices his life to rid the world of the Gyaos once and for all. Thirty-three years later, a small boy, whose father witnessed the 1973 event, named Toru finds a mysterious egg. From it, hatches a small Turtle. Toru and his friends raise the turtle, who turns out to be a small Gamera. After a new man-eating creature named Zedus shows up in Japan, it's up to the small Gamera to save the world as the previous Gamera had done before.

movies.title: The Osiris Child
movies.summary: Set in a time of interplanetary colonization, Sy Lombrok (Kellan Lutz), a former nurse who is now a drifter with a haunted past, forms an unlikely alliance with Kane Sommerville (Daniel MacPherson), a lieutenant who works for off-world military contractor Exor. In a race against time they set out to rescue Kane's young daughter Indi (Teagan Croft) amid an impending global crisis precipitated by Exor.
